title: Introduction to PySchool.net
description: PySchool.net is a Python programming environment where students can create, edit, load, save and execute Python scripts directly in a browser.  The main directives of PySchool.net is to be free for educators and students, and to reduce the technological burdens of hosting programming classes.  PySchool.net  is powered by Brython, and is 100% open source and is hosted on github.
